body_html: I have been troubled by this problem recently. cv2.setNumThreads(0) doesn't work for me. I even change all cv2 code to use scikit-image instead, but the problem still exists. Besides, I have 16G for /dev/shm. I only have this problem when using multiple gpus. Every thing works fine on single gpu. Do anyone has any new thoughts on the solution?
body_text: I have been troubled by this problem recently.  cv2.setNumThreads(0) doesn't work for me.  I even change all cv2 code to use scikit-image instead, but the problem still exists. Besides, I have 16G for /dev/shm.  I only have this problem when using multiple gpus. Every thing works fine on single gpu. Do anyone has any new thoughts on the solution?
body: I have been troubled by this problem recently.  `cv2.setNumThreads(0)` doesn't work for me.  I even change all cv2 code to use scikit-image instead, but the problem still exists. Besides, I have 16G for `/dev/shm`.  I only have this problem when using multiple gpus. Every thing works fine on single gpu. Do anyone has any new thoughts on the solution?
